column3: Hellraiser: Deader is a 2003 American horror film directed by Rick Bota. It is the seventh installment in the Hellraiser series. Like the previous two entries in the series
column4: Hellraiser: Inferno and Hellraiser: Hellseeker it began as an unrelated horror spec script owned by Dimension
column5: which was rewritten as a Hellraiser film. The original script was written by Neal Marshall Stevens who also wrote the script for the 2001 remake of Thirteen Ghosts.
